pullrequest.title: Do not include dependencies in standard locations (osrf-common, sandia-hand)

content.raw: It is hard to say for me. Since we are using /usr instead of the expected /opt/$distro/ros our packages are closer to be consider like a "system dependency" than like a proper ROS package. It could be consider as a bug, just in case I'm not missing something else in our setup.
content.html: It is hard to say for me. Since we are using /usr instead of the expected /opt/$distro/ros our packages are closer to be consider like a "system dependency" than like a proper ROS package. It could be consider as a bug, just in case I'm not missing something else in our setup.
